item.title: Arrow above NPC?
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

Hey guys I made the tutorial island from 2006 and I wanted to add the arrow that flashes on the tops and I cannot seem to do it. Also for some reaon when I use the spawn command there is an arrow above the NPC I spawn.
Here is my spawn code

} else if (playerCommand.startsWith("spawn")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, Integer.parseInt(args[1]), c.absX, c.absY, 0, 0, 100, 10, 10, 10, false, true); c.sendMessage("You spawn NPC: " + Integer.parseInt(args[1])); } catch (Exception e) { }
Does anyone got any ideas?

Thanks for your help!

Read full topic
